org.jetel.graph.analyse

Class GraphCycleInspector

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.graph.analyse.GraphCycleInspector

  • public class GraphCycleInspector
extends java.lang.Object
    This is graph cycle detector. Inspects a graph provided by a GraphProvider and all cycles are interrupted by BUFFERED edge. In general, this is a core class for graph analysis and detection, where the buffered edges needs to be used to avoid deadlocks. Each DIRECT edge is considered as double-way relationship between two linked components. BUFFERED and PHASE edges are considered as only one-way relationship oriented from reader to writer. Each cycle of relationships is interrupted by a BUFFERED edge.

    • Method Detail

      • inspectGraph

        public void inspectGraph()
        Inspects the graph provided by GraphProvider passed in constructor. Some of DIRECT edges are switched to BUFFERED - that is only result. In case an oriented cycle is detected, JetelRuntimeException is thrown.

      • cycleFound

        protected void cycleFound(java.util.Stack<InspectedComponent> visitedComponents)
        Cycle in the graph found - first regularly oriented edge is marked as BUFFERED.
